tools.name: bam2sam
tools.description: Convert bam files to sam files
tools.code:
{
  "name": "bam2sam",
  "description": "Convert bam files to sam files",
  "invoke": "samtools view",
  "filelists": [
    "/Users/zhouanbo/ElectronProjects/pipelinedog/examples/bam2sam/INPUT.list.txt"
  ],
  "options": [
    "-h",
    "%INPUT%",
    "%OUTPUT%"
  ],
  "input_option": "%1F:-L:P-B:''E:'l'A%",
  "output_option": "%1F:-L:P1B:'.sam'E:'l'A%",
  "label_option": "",
  "output_files": [
    "%1F:-L:P1B:'.sam'E%"
  ]
}

codeobj.name: bam2sam
codeobj.description: Convert bam files to sam files

tools.parsedCommand:
samtools view -h /home/usr/file1.bam /home/usr/file1.sam&
samtools view -h /home/usr/file2.bam /home/usr/file2.sam&
samtools view -h /home/usr/file3.bam /home/usr/file3.sam&
